org.apache.hama.graph

Class OffHeapVerticesInfo<V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<?>,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hama.graph.OffHeapVerticesInfo<V,E,M>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VerticesInfo<V,E,M>

    public class OffHeapVerticesInfo<V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<?>,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends Object
implements VerticesInfo<V,E,M>
    An off heap version of a Vertex storage.
